Reviews.Title: Very nice user friendly product!
Reviews.Author: AnneB
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera I love the fact that I cane email pictures to friends and family from where I am. I carry my wifi and tablet when we travel. Easy to operate and user friendly. A very good find!

ProductInfo.Features:
16.2MP CCD Image Sensor - ISO 100 to 12800
3.0" 230k-Dot LCD - Wi-Fi Direct, Email
25-125mm f/2.5 5x Optical Zoom Lens - 2D Panorama, Smart Auto, Smart Movie
Capture HD 720/30p Video - Face, Blink and Smile Detection
Direct LINK, Mobile Link, Remote VF - microSD/microSDHC Memory Card Slot
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung ST150F 16.2MP WiFi Ready Smart Compact Digital Camera in Silver + 8GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
